channel.title: Miscellany on RHD Front-end Code and Documentation

item.title: Buttons and CTAs
item.description: Button variations Regular button styles <button class="pf-c-button pf-m-primary">Primary</button> <button class="pf-c-button pf-m-secondary">Secondary</button> <button class="pf-c-button pf-m-tertiary">Tertiary</button> <button class="pf-c-button pf-m-danger">Danger</button> <button class="pf-c-button pf-m-link"> Link button <span class="pf-c-button__icon"><i class="fas fa-arrow-right" aria-hidden="true"></i></span> </button> Primary Secondary Tertiary Danger Link button Large button styles <pfe-cta pfe-priority="primary" pfe-color="base">CTA / Primary / base</pfe-cta> <pfe-cta pfe-priority="secondary" pfe-color="base">CTA / Secondary / base</pfe-cta> CTA / Primary / base CTA / Secondary / base Button states Primary button styles <button pf-m-focus" type="button">Primary focus</button> <button class="pf-c-button pf-m-primary pf-m-disabled" type="button">Primary disabled</button> Primary Primary active Primary focus Primary disabled
